name: Blackthorn Events Platform
description: Full-stack events platform as the most used Salesforce app at Blackthorn.io, handling 100k concurrent users with a dedicated Redis cache layer and Salesforce data synchronization.

name: Suno Stock Market API
description: Node.js API with React dashboard integrating with multiple APIs for real-time stock market data. Managed ~100k assets using HTTP, Crons, and WebSockets, serving 100k+ users.

name: Video Streaming Mobile App
description: Mobile video streaming app built for a beauty and makeup course for a 1M+ follower influencer. Shipped through OniQ Tecnologia, reaching 100k+ users.

name: Eats For You
